predicate.note: Frames file for 'bootleg' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: adjectival
example.text: In September 1971 California officials seized ``bootlegged'' lenses -- made by unlicensed companies -- after some showed traces of bacteria.

example.name: verbal
example.text: John bootlegged Mary's entire collection of ABBA tapes.
example.arg: Mary's entire collection of ABBA tapes
